Dear Mr. Sandler:
My thanks for supplying copies
of the many favorable stories which
are being carried by leading newspapers
regarding the importance of having
educational radio included in the
Public Television Act of 1967.
This service is most appreciated,
Mr. Sandler by Nick Zapple and other
members of my staff as well as by
myself.
Kindest regards.
